sentences.sContent: "Then can I have one answer in return?" he demanded.
sentences.sCn: “那么，作为回报我要索取一个回答咯？” 他要求道。

sentences.sContent: And in return for an acknowledgment, which must give me some pain, you cannot deny me the privilege of disliking him as much as ever.
sentences.sCn: 不过，这种应承肯定会给我带来痛苦，作为对我的报答，你不能剥夺我可以一如既往地不喜欢他的权利。

trans.tranOther: as a way of thanking sb or paying them for sth they have done
